entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement Rows/Columns on Editor and Deprecate AutoSize #3429
    .NET 7
  • Editor inside VerticalStackLayout automatically grows vertically on Android/WinUI but not on iOS #3425
  • its Impossible to do more than one MAUI-Library Project into a Solution in VS2022 RC !! #3424
  • Maui manifest is not signed at maui check at net 6.0.100 rc3 #3423
  • Error NU1605 after upgrading to 17.1.0 Preview 1.0 #3422
  • VS17.1Prv1: Maui default solution loads of errors #3421
  • .net MAUI app not building #3420
  • VS17.1Prv1: MAUI fails default project build even after updating manually via maui-check & template update #3419
  • MAUI Project Template Has Build Errors #3417
  • VS2022 17.0.1 P1 Can't build MAUI sample project #3416
  • Xamarin Maui DisplayAlert does not appear (no message display pop-up) when using NavigationPage #3415
  • VS17.1prv1 - WeatherTwentyOne app error #3414
  • [Bug] [iOS] IsVisible doesn't work for custom controls which inherits from View #3410
  • [Bug] Visual Studio does not debug Android app with Name property on ActivityAttribute #3407
  • [Bug] 'DllNotFoundException: libcoreclr.so' when I attempt to perform a login through iOS #3406

Closed

  • Use Microsoft Edge HTML/CSS renderer as self-contained in Blazor MAUI apps #3390
  • MAUI Need recipe on android when uncomment windows project #3242
  • [Bug] WinUI: Entry.Text is always null #2877
  • ContentProperty attribute ignored if base type is a Collection #3251
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3404
  • [Enhancement] Update DatePicker and TimePicker to use DateOnly and TimeOnly structs #1847
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3408
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3405
  • [Bug] 6.0.100-rc.1.1528 is not found in NuGet feeds #2840
  • [Bug] Updating Image Properties through Code-Behind does not reflect in UI. #2153
    6.0.101-preview.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Build projects in parallel #3428
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add `repro.md` to issue template #3427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Button border properties #3409
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Update issue template version boxes #3426
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove the temporary patch #3418
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix GitHub actions #3413
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [WiP] Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
    do-not-merge
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • MAUI 395 port editor Autosize to handler #1202
    do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • Use the Default Button Styles (Windows 11 Styles) #3363
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Core] Rename XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #3368
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨
  • Minimal changes required to support RemoteWebView #2469
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨
  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
